author: Freya McClements
title: Virologist says tackling Covid-19 should be co-ordinated on an all-Ireland basis
description: Outbreaks of coronavirus are evolving at the same time in both the South and North
content:
Measures to lift the lockdown imposed to tackle coronavirus in Ireland should be co-ordinated on an all-island basis, according to a Belfast virologist who is researching the virus. 
Dr Connor Bamford, from the Wellcome-Wolfson Institute for Experimental Med… [+3956 chars]
